description:
“I’m voting for RuPaul… OH, Rand Paul.”
Elite Daily had drag queens play an epic game of "Fuck, Marry, Kill" with GOP candidates and the results were hilarious.
youtube.com / Via youtube.com
Without even knowing who Rick Santorum is, she was ready to fuck him.

Via youtube.com
While this queen was all set to kill Jeb Bush because there is only one bush in her life.

Via youtube.com
Everyone else was shitting on Donald Trump, but this queen had some pretty foolproof logic for why she'd marry him.

Via youtube.com

title: Drag Queens Play "Fuck, Marry, Kill" With Republican Candidates
